name: Roo.tree.TreeFilter
desc: Note this class is experimental and doesn't update the indent (lines) or expand collapse icons of the nodes

methods.name: clear
methods.desc:
Clears the current filter. Note: with the "remove" option
set a filter cannot be cleared.

methods.name: filter
methods.desc: Filter the data by a specific attribute.

params.name: value
params.desc:
Either string that the attribute value
should start with or a RegExp to test against the attribute

params.name: attr
params.desc: (optional) The attribute passed in your node's attributes collection. Defaults to "text".

params.name: startNode
params.desc: (optional) The node to start the filter at.

methods.name: filterBy
methods.desc:
Filter by a function. The passed function will be called with each
node in the tree (or from the startNode). If the function returns true, the node is kept
otherwise it is filtered. If a node is filtered, its children are also filtered.

params.name: scope
params.desc: (optional) The scope of the function (defaults to the current node)
